wavefunction.definition: A function that is defined such that the non-infinite integral of the square of the function represents the probability density of locating a particle at a particular point in space.

virtualparticle.definition: an elementary particle of transitory existence that does not appear as a free particle in a particular situation but that can transmit a force from one particle to another.

links.title: Forum: Learn the Physics of Virtual Particles in Quantum Mechanics
